name: Man Ka Chun - Cyrus
title: IT Portfolio
intro: Cyrus aspires to be a Full-Stack Engineer and has earned his IT diploma in Osaka, Japan, graduating in March 2025. He has since moved to Hong Kong. Before his shift to the IT field, he was involved in the video production sector, working as a video editor, photographer, and multimedia designer, with an emphasis on visual media and commercial video production.

wiz.p1: Developed frontend for enterprise payroll system using Next.js 14 (Turbopack) and company base module, implementing UI and interactions for salary calculation and report generation.
wiz.p2: Built frontend for government internal e-card bulk sending system using Next.js (Turbopack) and company base module, creating interfaces for bulk sending, template management, sending records, and access control.
wiz.p3: Styled components with Tailwind CSS and RizzUI for responsive design, utilized Turbopack for faster development, and participated in code reviews and API integrations.

sjm.p1: In SJM Holdings’ marketing department, tasked with producing promotional videos to highlight Macau’s unique events as a local gaming enterprise.
sjm.p2: Create TV commercials, YouTube channel content, and event promotion/record videos to enhance brand visibility and engagement.
sjm.p3: Within a 3-person team, conceptualised, filmed, and edited videos, incorporating motion graphics to enhance visual appeal using professional tools.
sjm.p4: Produced an average of 3 YouTube videos and 2 event record videos or highlight videos monthly, increasing event participation by 20%.

fhia.p2: Created motion graphic video of promotion.

year2.intro2b: Actively search for up to 3 matches by matching users based on criteria in the database. With Dating Date, there are endless possibilities for finding your perfect match.
